column1: Little Goat Diner////I'd been looking forward to going to Little Goat for quite some time
column2: and was bummed after tonight's meal.  To start
column3: the fried pickles & onions were super greasy. Obviously grease is to be expected with fried anything
column4: but it was excessive.  They ran out of my top dinner choice
column5: so I selected the Korean burger
column6: which was...interesting. Our service was mediocre
column7: and the best part of the meal was my cocktail.
